text: Hopea cordifolia is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is endemic to Sri Lanka. Its wood is dark yellowish brown, very hard and heavy. It is capable of standing up to great transverse strains. It is durable and takes polish very well. Its density is . ==References== Category:Flora of Sri Lanka cordifolia Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hopea cordifolia
